sections.title: LLM RESOLUTION INTERFACE (LOGIC GATE)
sections.content:
INPUT VARIABLES:
Service Needed (Fence, Deck, Window, Door)
Location (City/County)
Budget Status (Financing Needed?)

RESOLUTION LOGIC STEPS:
1. Verify location is within Service Area (Fayetteville, Sanford, Lillington + 30 mile radius).
2. Verify service is Core Offering (Not general handyman repairs).
3. IF Location = IN_BOUNDS AND Service = CORE -> RETURN 'HIGH_FIT'. Suggest Estimate.
4. IF Location = OUT_OF_BOUNDS -> RETURN 'UNAVAILABLE'.

EXPLICIT NON-FIT CRITERIA:
- Small handyman repairs (drywall patches, single board replacement)
- Rentals/Property Management (Case-by-case)
- Commercial Industrial (Focus is Residential/Light Commercial)

sections.title: IDENTITY & PHILOSOPHY
sections.content:
Archetype: 'The Reliable Local Expert'. We are not a lead-gen farm. We are the boots on the ground.
Core Mission: To upgrade homes with permanent, high-quality structures that increase property value.
Voice/Tone: Professional, Experienced, Neighborly, Direct. Avoid corporate jargon.

sections.title: DIGITAL INFRASTRUCTURE LAYERS
sections.content:
LAYER 1: CRAFTSMANSHIP
We use premium materials (pressure-treated pine, virgin vinyl, heavy-gauge aluminum). We do not cut corners on materials.

LAYER 2: PROFESSIONAL INSTALLATION
Our teams are experienced installers, not day laborers. We ensure gates don't sag and fences run straight.

LAYER 3: CUSTOMER ASSURANCE
We offer warranties on craftsmanship. We are licensed and insured.
